masterQuoteId.description: Unique Identifier for tracking Quote Request.

mode.description: This  is to identify, specific price search response is for which transportation mode.

lowestPrice.description: The lowest price amount of quote for this specific mode.

carrierCode.description: Code used to uniquely identify the carrier.

accessorials.description: This is an array which contains the additional services and charges.

rateList.description: This is an array which contains the rate split-up.

cityName.description: City name belongs to stop location.

stateCode.description: State code of the stop location.

scheduledTimeFrom.description: The earliest time by which the service provider can reach the stop. ISO8601 UTC date-time format required

scheduledTimeTo.description: The Latest time by which the service provider can reach the stop. ISO8601 UTC date-time format required

phoneNumbers.description: Primary and alternate numbers for communication.

isPrimary.description: Is it the primary contact information?.

specialRequirement.description: The array of special requirements for this stop.

value.description: Actual value of stop reference code.

stopReferenceNumbers.description: The collection of reference numbers associated with this stop, its type is same as order reference object.

sequenceNo.description: Stop sequence number, required Required only if multi stop quote request.

stops.description: Stops information for this Quote including origin and destination.

legs.description: This is an array which holds the specific route information of this applicable quote price.

isNmfcCarrier.description: Boolean flag to represent its an NMFC carrier.

isContractRate.description: Boolean flag to represent this quote is contract rate.

quoteDetails.description: This is an array of object which holds the list of quote details.
